Text: How do you manage the Content ExplosionDear Jeffrey Vignette points to The Yankee Group report Managing the Content Explosion into ContentBased Applications Exclusive only to subscribers of Yankee Group Services this comprehensive report is available to you as a special offer compliments of Vignette To request a copy please go to ebusinessinf and the report will be mailed to you If you do not wish to receive future editions of The Vignette Monthly Analyst Report please select the following link and click send to unsubscribe mailtosubjectunsubscribereport
